page.title: 10MY LOCAL ENVIRONMENT 1
page.content: In my street there is a bus depot.You might think this is good but it is not.The buses spread fumes all round the street and sometimes the buses keep us awake at night. The people across the road from the bus station don't bother to keep their gardens looking good because the fumes from the buses just ruin their gardens. Sometimes buses have diesel leaking from them and cars might not see this oil and skid and crash.Also the employees at the depot park in the residents parking spaces.This often happens to us while we are out at the shops and we have to park further away from the house and it takes us a while to take the shopping back to the house.The people in my street have written to the local press about this and we are hoping that the depot will be moved.
